name: Sterling Silver Stackable Textured Rings, Set of 4, Hammered shiny bands, Made to order in your size
description:
Sterling silver stackable rings, SET OF 4 hammered shiny bands.
Sizes 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11 

This rings set is entirely hand crafted by me and it will be MADE TO ORDER for you in YOUR requested SIZE.

This set has 4 sterling silver bands. Each band is made from 16 gauge half hard (which means more durable) sterling silver wire. The rings are handforged, hammered for texture and tumbled for shine and extra durability. After handforging the width of each ring slightly increases to 1.5 mm so total width of the whole set is approx 2.4 inches (6mm). I proudly use high top quality sterling silver.

This set is available in any size from 4 to 11. Half and quarter sizes are available. If you want a different number of rings in your set, please convo me.

Please include your ring size when ordering. If you need help figuring out your ring size please visit
http://www.bluenile.com/pdf/bluenile_ringsizer_copyright2008.pdf 

All my jewelry is handcrafted by me  and it is new, unworn. I ship right within 1-2 business days after receiving cleared payment via Priority Mail. Approximative delivery time: 6-16 days to U.S.A.


If you have a problem with jewelry purchased from me, as long as the damage is not due to an intentional abuse, my warranty coves the repairs. I also offer free repair of minor wear and tear. Be ready to pay the low shipping both ways. 

I always appreciate your positive feedback :)

Thank you very much, 
Corina

categories.name: Handmade textured silver slim stackable rings

name: 8 Hammered, Copper Stackable Bangles / Bracelets Rustic & Organic, brown, burnt, sienna, terracotta,
description:
Warm and Earthy: These are 8 handmade by me rustic & organic copper stackable bangles / bracelets.

I love the feel of patinaed copper metal which has a weather worn appearance. These copper bangles come with a few layers of patina as well as a layer of sealant and wax, which coat the copper and behave as a barrier between your skin and the copper, so it is safe for you and your clothes.

On top of the patina, you can notice the hammered textures: grooves, ripples, pockmarks, while I keep a few bangles shiny and smooth.

Small = 2 1/4 inches in diameter
Medium = 2 1/2 inches
Large = 2 3/4 inches.

All pieces are created by hand so no two items are identical. That's the beauty of the product!

Please allow for slight variances from what is shown in the made to order photos.
Of course, I appreciate your positive feedback:)

Thank you so much for looking!
Corina:)

name: SET OF 3 sterling silver stacking band rings hammered texture, sizes 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11
description:
SET OF 3 sterling silver stacking band rings hammered texture, sizes 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11

This ring set is entirely hand crafted and it will be MADE TO ORDER in YOUR requested SIZE.

This set has 3 sterling silver bands. Each band is made from 16 gauge half hard sterling silver wire. The rings are handforged, hammered for texture and tumbled for shine and extra durability. 

This set is available in any size from 5 to 11. Half and quarter sizes are available.

Do you want a set with a different number of rings? Just message me.

Please include your true ring size when ordering. If you need help figuring out your ring size please visit
http://www.bluenile.com/pdf/bluenile_ringsizer_copyright2008.pdf
Measure your fingers when they are warm. Never measure your fingers when they are cold.

All my jewelry is handcrafted by me and it is new, unworn. Being handcrafted, no two items are identical. Gift pouch is included in the price. I ship right within 1-2 business days after receiving cleared payment via Priority Mail.

PayPal payment only.

If you have a problem with jewelry purchased from me, as long as the damage is not due to intentional abuse, my warranty coves the repairs. I also offer free repair of minor wear and tear. Be ready to pay the shipping both ways.

Of course, I appreciate your positive feedback :)

name: SET OF 7 handmade hammered sterling silver stackable rings, sizes 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11
description:
A set of 7 sterling silver stackable rings. Wear only one ring, or perhaps a stack of 5 rings as the rings are separate and they are not connected to each other.

This ring set is entirely hand crafted and it will be MADE TO ORDER for you in YOUR requested SIZE.

This set has 7 sterling silver bands. Each band is made from 16 gauge half hard sterling silver wire. The rings are handforged, hammered for texture and tumbled for shine and extra durability. After hand forging the width of each ring increade slighly to approx 1.5 mm. Total width of the set is approx 4 1/4 in (10.5 mm). 
I proudly use top high quality sterling silver from Turkey.

This set is available in any size from 4 to 11. Half and quarter sizes are also available.

If you want a set of rings with a different number of rings, please convo me. Also pls check out all my other stack ring sets. 

Please include your true ring size when ordering. If you need help figuring out your ring size please visit
http://www.bluenile.com/pdf/bluenile_ringsizer_copyright2008.pdf
Measure your fingers when they are warm. Never measure your fingers when they are cold. 

All my jewelry is handcrafted by me and it is new, unworn. Gift pouch is included in the price. I ship right within 1-2 business days after receiving cleared payment through registered air mail of Turkish Post. Approximative delivery time: 4-8 days to Europe, 6-16 days to U.S.A.

PayPal payment only.

If you have a problem with jewelry purchased from me, as long as the damage is not due to intentional abuse, my warranty coves the repairs. I also offer free repair of minor wear and tear. Be ready to pay the shipping both ways. 

I appreciate your positive feedback :)

Thank you so much, 
Corina
